overview:
Our Company is nominated for the Achievement Award 2010, please see below few photos of our CEO receiving Award: http://www.leadconcept.com/achievements.html

Greetings,

LEADconcept is located at Lahore, Pakistan [GMT 5 hours] and our Head Office is functional in California, USA. We are in business since last 12 years. Our clients are spread in all over the sphere such as USA, UK, Canada, Sweden, Denmark, Australia and many other countries. We can self-assuredly provide you our clients references for your assistance in case you want to verify the company s reputation and capability. No beating around the bush, please go ahead and verify what our clients declare about LEADconcept: http://www.leadconcept.com/clientfeedback.html

Some useful information about the Company and process of work:

  • We have 30 developers working in house on various projects. You can have visual cues of the office, staff & some of our CEO pictures from this URL: http://www.zonebits.com/staff.zip.

  • We recommend online technical meetings to discuss the requirements to fulfill the clients thoughts to ensure the same line of action. As it is very important to have upfront meetings in any outsourcing projects.

  • Our steady success rolling out the huge projects largely depends on regular communication and interaction with the clients through MSN/Yahoo/Skype/AOL/VOIP Phone/Emails), response time, online progress on our Demo Server to get feedback/comments, revision till the clients satisfaction.

  • Another hallmark is that we have flexible working hours and timings adjustment according to clients needs & limitations.

  • Lastly, our team is always there to cater your on-going and future needs to maintain long-term business relationship.

We also offer a monthly rate, where our programmer/designer work directly with our customers. Basically they are dedicated to their projects and not allowed to work for any other project. Customer can interact with them whenever they want to thru’ MSN, ICQ, Yahoo etc. or phone calls. They provide a weekly progress report in Excel File for customers to show them number of hours they spend on the tasks.

All in all, you will have a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals working for you who will be able to quickly grasp your needs and deliver a solution that will be sufficient for now as well as upgradeable in the future.

We have developed a large number of Web/Software Applications, Flash Intros, Multimedia CDs, Presentations, Logos, Corporate Identity, Brochures, etc. for our customers in USA, Canada, UK, Switzerland, Taiwan, and China. We can show you our Software Application developed in Access, VB, VB.NET etc. screen shots on request.

We also provide Hosting Services, please see our website to know more about our Hosting Plans. We have or own servers in California. We are providing a very competing price. Feel free to contact us for more detail.

OTHER CONSIDERATIONS:

So, before taking up any project we must know each other well.

(1) We will provide you with a detailed methodology of the project while you will be expected to give a detailed list of project objectives.

(2) We will be glad to develop the detailed flowcharts of the modules and pieces that you would like to be developed for this project.

(3) We will be responsible to get the work done on time.

(4) We can simply say that the work that we will undertake for you will be cost-effective worth every penny you spend on it.

Our team of highly proficient and dedicated Programmers comprises of university graduates with a strong hold on software development, experienced in languages such as C , Visual C , Visual Basic, Java, ASP, ASP.net and PHP.

COMMITMENTS:

(1) During the development phase, we will be in regular contact with you, uploading the project on regular basis for your guidance and approval, making all revisions wholeheartedly.

(2) We will be available all the time to take your directions and to any advise you on any technical features that your application should have.

(3) Most importantly, we will be signing any NDA that you will require, protecting your confidential business info, as we would like others to do for us.

Upon your return comments, we will provide you a detailed proposal with break down of the tasks, man-hours of the project that we would like you to receive from us, something that will be worth every penny you spend here.

Areas of Focus

Web Page Development: HTML, Dreamweaver, Dreamweaver UltraDev (Preferred), Visual Interdev, Drumbeat, FrontPage, JavaScript, Jscript, VBscript.

Designing: Adobe Photoshop (Preferred), Image Ready, Flash, CorelDraw, Freehand, and Anipro for 2DAnimation, 3DMax and 3D Studio, Apple QuickTime, Adobe AfterEffects, Fireworks.

Operating Systems: Windows 2003 .NET Server, Linux, Unix, Windows 95, Windows 98, Win ME/XP and Windows NT/2000.

Databases: Oracle, MS SQL Server, MS Access, MySQL.

Server Side Development: .NET, Java, Java Servlets & JSP, JavaBeans, JDBC, J2EE Framework and patterns, EJB 2.0, JCA, JMS, JNDI.

Languages: C/C , Java (JDK2.0) Applets, VC , Visual Basic DAO, ActiveX Data Objects (ADO), ActiveX, COM, DCOM, Microsoft Transaction Server (MTS), Microsoft Message Queing (MSMQ), VB.NET, C#.
